name: Lazy Waiter!
description:
Lazy Waiter is a fun fast paced arcade swipe fest of a game that’s all about throwing customers their food and coffee orders!

The clock is ticking down and the customers are waiting for their orders.

Once the food comes out on the conveyor belt from the kitchen its ready to be tossed to the customer. The objective of the game is to throw the correct food to the correct customer, safely landing their food order in front of them in the designated safe landing area.
